list_definition.definition: a position or attitude of the body
a false manner or way of behaving assumed in order to impress others; pretence

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His indignation was only a pose.

list_definition.definition: to position oneself eg for a photograph to be taken
to set or offer (a question or problem) for answering or solving
